item.title: YouTuber Survivors
item.description:
About This Game

Story

A super popular fitness YouTuber with over 5 million subscribers... The protagonist, Beom-
tae, is happily running a YouTube channel, receiving tremendous love from fans.

Can it be this intense?!! This is... dangerous!!

Survive from the fans...!


Youtuber Survivors is a BEAT 'EM UP + Rogue-like action game. A unique "One button combo system" makes complex technical movements in a breeze.

Key features:


  • 2D BEAT 'EM UP + Rogue-like!
  • A cartoon-like story filled with humor!
  • Easy One button combo system!
  • Unlock permanent trait for your character!

item.title: Detective Ridelle
item.description:
About This Game

Solve the Clues. Unravel the Mystery.


Ridelle receives an anonymous letter inviting her on a luxury train. On board, she's already suspicious - but when someone is found dead it's up to her to catch the killer.

Detective Ridelle is a first-person puzzle game with visual novel style storytelling.

Explore a unique, handcrafted world filled with suspects, clues, and hidden secrets.
Can you uncover the truth and bring the killer to justice?

On board you will find:


  • Escape Room Puzzles
    Featuring unique puzzles by a real escape room designer. You'll need to keep your wits about you to solve them all.
  • A Cast of Crazy Characters
    Why are all these people on the train? Where were they at the time of the murder?
    Why does everyone seem to have something to hide?
    It's up to you to find out.
  • Unique Handcrafted Environments
    Enjoy uncovering and exploring the many locations handcrafted with a unique visual style.
  • A Thrilling Mystery
    There's a murderer on board and you're the only one who can stop them. Unravel the web of clues to find the killer before it's too late.

item.title: 消失的妹妹(The Vanished Sister)
item.description:
About This Game

Developed independently by a Bilibili horror game anchor for two and a half years

Background story:

My younger sister mysteriously disappeared, and the protagonist followed her trail to a mysterious sea building. As night fell, the terrifying secrets buried here gradually became apparent.

Gameplay:

In this game, players need to avoid the capture of "spiritual bodies" that may be hidden in any corner, stimulate all intelligence, and use various props found along the way to find ways to escape. Even the most tenacious players must give their all in harsh environments, do their best to survive, and escape into the sky.

Game features:

-Typical design of traditional horror escape games
-Innovatively adding an emotional system to artificial intelligence, accumulating anger points while chasing players. With each stage of anger, AI's various abilities will be improved to varying degrees
-Carefully building advanced artificial intelligence systems
-All props are randomly generated, with multiple escape methods and a permanent death mechanism, providing a brand new experience in each game
-The game is divided into multiple levels of difficulty, each with its own unique design

item.title: Defense Contract
item.description:
About This Game

Grapple hook racing


Speed through challenging race levels using grappling hooks in VR. Defense Contract is built for virtual reality and provides a unique and exciting experience aimed at VR veterans but still enjoyable to those without their "VR legs" for short periods.

Defense Contract will appeal to players looking for more intense, fast paced VR content. While it does contain a level editor that is surprisingly fun and low-key, the majority of the content is exhilarating, superhero-feeling racing game play.

Current features

  • Grapple hook racing
  • Over 20 built in levels (with more being added)
  • Fully VR level editor for creating your own challenges

item.title: Abyssmare
item.description:
About This Game

Abyssmare is a near future science fiction world view based on the Cthulhu Mythos world view, and an action game based on Roguelite+first person shooting.

gameplay：

1.Old-School FPS
With ultra-high movement speed and sustainable output of powerful firepower, all you need to do is attack and explode all the living creatures.
Your goal is to explore the dungeon and find the elevator that leads to the lower level. During this process, you can search for resources in the maze to strengthen yourself, such as ammunition, medical kits, energy crystals, and various weapons and equipment.


2.Manual random maze
On the surface, it is a randomly generated maze, but in reality, all changes in the maze are artificially designed.
This game aims to achieve randomness while ensuring a maze exploration experience.


3.Weapons and Equipments
More than 30 completely different firearms.
More than 20 sub weapons with different functions.
Each profession has a melee weapon.
More than 40 different equipment components, each with unique functions and effects.
The quantity of these items will continue to be updated.
I hope this can enhance your enjoyment of exploring the maze.


4.Roguelite game
This game has two growth cycles.
Growth in a single adventure: includes acquiring weapons and equipment, improving personal attributes, obtaining random buffs, and shopping in temporary stores.
Growth through multiple adventures: The protagonist can obtain a certain amount of resources for each adventure, regardless of victory or death. After completing a single adventure, they can consume resources and permanently enhance the character's strength.

5.Action-RPG game
This game has certain RPG elements, such as custom characters, equipment, and random entries on equipment, character professions, character attributes, etc.


6.Enemies
16 regular enemies+10 bosses, and will continue to be updated.
Except for human enemies, they are all based on the classic Cthulhu Mythos series novels.

Cthulhu Mythos elements:

In this game, monsters and old dominators in the Cthulhu Mythos, whose size is approximately similar to that of human beings and may be destroyed by human weapons, are selected as enemies, and a new image is designed for them.
Most enemies have undergone physical modifications and are wearing "ShenWei" exoskeletons, hoping these will make you feel interesting.

item.title: Jousting in January
item.description:
About This Game

Jousting in January is a g̶̶̶o̶̶̶o̶̶̶f̶̶̶y̶̶̶ ̶̶̶s̶̶̶i̶̶̶d̶̶̶e̶̶̶ ̶̶̶p̶̶̶r̶̶̶o̶̶̶j̶̶̶e̶̶̶c̶̶̶t̶̶̶ ̶̶̶I̶̶̶ ̶̶̶t̶̶̶h̶̶̶r̶̶̶e̶̶̶w̶̶̶ ̶̶̶t̶̶̶o̶̶̶g̶̶̶e̶̶̶t̶̶̶h̶̶̶e̶̶̶r̶̶̶ ̶̶̶t̶o̶ ̶e̶n̶t̶e̶r̶t̶a̶i̶n̶ ̶m̶y̶s̶e̶l̶f̶ ̶̶̶s̶̶̶i̶̶̶n̶̶̶c̶̶̶e̶̶̶ ̶̶̶m̶̶̶y̶̶̶ ̶̶̶m̶̶̶a̶̶̶i̶̶̶n̶̶̶ ̶̶̶p̶̶̶r̶̶̶o̶̶̶j̶̶̶e̶̶̶c̶̶̶t̶̶̶ ̶̶̶h̶̶̶a̶̶̶s̶̶̶ ̶̶̶h̶̶̶i̶̶̶t̶̶̶ ̶̶̶s̶̶̶o̶̶̶m̶̶̶e̶̶̶ ̶̶̶d̶̶̶e̶̶̶l̶̶̶a̶̶̶y̶̶̶s̶̶̶ free for all arcade game in which you must strike the enemy before they get you. 1 hit kill. 1st hit wins. Game features include:

- 8 levels randomly selected at the start of each round
- 2+ players in local multiplayer
- An easy access Quit Game button so you can go run conveniently timed errands before your friends catch up to your score
- Melee weapon that can be thrown as a projectile (or left on the ground like a spike trap in one of those dimly lit parts of the map)
- Movement in 8 directions

P.S. You will be unarmed after throwing your lance. You'll have to go pick it up or lead the enemies to your lance sitting on the ground.

item.title: SE VR World Demo
item.description:
About This Game

This game is a playable technology showcase that introduces game mechanics, in this VR project. This game (technology showcase) will serve as the basis of the VR game system for separate new game.
Game will be adventure game with a story, only single player.
A lot of game stuff like models, textures, sounds are from original game Space Engineers.

Player will playing with 2 characters alternately, one as Engineer and second as Policeman on space station.

The Engineer will mainly manually repair various devices. The Policeman will assist the Engineer and have weapons available to protect them from infected Engineers.



This technology showcase is created on Unreal Engine 4.

Compatibility of VR head sets: I'm doing it on Oculus Rift but it's also compatible with Vive (teleport).

Movement: In technology showcase is teleport and free movement. Free movement is still WIP. On Vive can be problem with free movement.

This technology showcase is still WIP.


Music in Bar map is from: www.bensound.com



Original Space Engineers game


Many thanks to Remethep & The Tiamat Gaming Community for support of realization the final release phase.

item.title: EXIT KUN
item.description:
About This Game

This game is a game of finding differences and observing. Our game challenges players to carefully observe and spot the distinctions that lead them to the elusive "Exit KUN."

Game Overview:

You find yourself trapped in an enigmatic underground labyrinth, and your only goal is to reach "Exit KUN." The journey demands keen observation of your surroundings. Every detail matters, and anomalies could be your key to progress.

Key Features:

Observe Carefully: Scrutinize your surroundings to uncover anomalies that may guide your way or pose a threat.
Turn Back if Needed: If anomalies are detected, swift decision-making is crucial. Turn back immediately to avoid unforeseen consequences.
Forward Momentum: Should your observation reveal no anomalies, press forward.


Developer Notes:
This game is inspired by Exit 8. You are free to create, upload, and monetize videos and other content featuring Game on platforms such as YouTube, Twitch, and other video-sharing websites. The characters, places, and elements involved in the game are fictitious. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or events is purely coincidental.

item.title: Home Path
item.description:
About This Game

Home Path is a rogue-like Game where you have to help the Slime to Reach her Home. You have to survive 10 floors and help the little girl to not be hungry.



Get Random power-ups when you travel to the next Floor.



The floors are randomly generated so every playthrough has a new layout.

item.title: Star Lone Wolf
item.description:
About This Game

To learn more about 'Interstellar Lone Wolf' and its game information and benefits, join the official QQ group: 219926703.

Craft Your Own Genre

Spaceships, modules, talents, and items come together to create this world of endless possibilities. The spaceship determines the foundation, modules define the framework, and items flesh it out. Talents empower your genre to take shape smoothly. You'll need to combine your own genre by choosing the ship model, equipped talents, purchased items, and upgrading different modules.

Battle

In 'Interstellar Lone Wolf,' your spaceship will automatically search for and engage enemies in combat. Your primary task is to evade enemy collisions and incoming fire. Upon defeating enemies, they will drop crystals, which you can collect to gain experience points. When your experience bar is full, random module upgrade options will appear. Upgrading different modules will yield vastly different effects, and these upgrades shape the framework of your genre.

Side Quests

To embark on side quests in 'Interstellar Lone Wolf,' you must become familiar with the map and follow the building indicators at the screen's edges to locate your desired destinations. By visiting various buildings, you can accept different side quests and complete them to earn gold coins, which are crucial for your path to victory.

Gold Factory and Crystal Factory

For experienced players, it's essential to learn how to utilize your existing economy to secure future economic growth opportunities. Within the game, you'll encounter two buildings, the 'Gold Factory' and the 'Crystal Factory.' The Gold Factory periodically provides players with gold coins, with production capacity increasing with each upgrade. Similarly, the Crystal Factory periodically supplies crystals, and its production capacity also increases with each upgrade. Each factory can be upgraded to a maximum level of 10. Players must make strategic decisions based on their predictions for the game's progression, determining which factory to upgrade and to what level.

Main Quests

Your main objective in 'Interstellar Lone Wolf' is to defeat four Bosses, and the only way to achieve this is by empowering yourself through all the elements discussed above. If your genre isn't well-constructed or you're not earning money quickly enough, progressing through the later stages can become extremely challenging.

主线任务

击杀四个Boss是您的主线任务，通过上述所有内容，强大自己，是通关的唯一方法。如果流派搭建的不够完善，或者钱赚的不够快，就很难通过后续关卡。

GameOver and GameWin

When you first enter the game, you'll typically face challenges and might fall in battle as early as the second Boss. If you have gaming experience, even the third Boss can pose a significant challenge. Don't worry, whether you win or lose, the game features an evaluation system that assesses your performance and grants you corresponding experience points. Each time you level up, you will randomly receive a talent or unlock a new spaceship. The number of talents you can carry into battle is limited, so you'll need to choose them wisely based on your strategy. Players will gain an additional talent slot at levels 1, 4, and 7, and then every 10 levels thereafter, up to a maximum level of 100.

Challenge

Once you've crafted your own genre and successfully defeated all four Bosses, you can attempt to take on even higher difficulties. The game offers 26 difficulty levels, labeled from A to Z, and it's recommended to start with the lower difficulty levels before progressing to the higher ones. Difficulties can be stacked, allowing you to challenge multiple levels simultaneously. Each selected difficulty level adds a 20% bonus to the final experience earned. If you choose all 26 difficulties, you'll face a monumental challenge that might even turn your previous gaming experiences upside down. The specifics are left for you to explore, and we wish you the best of luck in your endeavors.

Module Synthesis

When specific modules reach their corresponding levels, new modules will become available for synthesis. You can check the specific synthesis formulas by clicking the 'Synthesis' button on the pause menu. Module synthesis can even lead to a profound transformation of your genre, but the details are left for you to explore on your own.

item.title: Frog Story : The Power Tongue
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a captivating adventure with a small frog and its powerful tongue, on a quest to gather scattered fireflies and, crucially, seal the shadows of the Dark Toad King. Navigate through a delightful puzzle-platformer world, mastering pushing and jumping mechanics across 96 intricately designed levels.

Explore the lush Green Marsh, venture into the abandoned Quarry, traverse the icy Watershed, and unravel the secrets within the fortress of the enigmatic Dark Toad King. Each location presents its own challenges and puzzles, adding layers of depth to your quest. Learn new and exciting gameplay elements, and face increasing challenges.

item.title: Soak & Splash
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the Soak & Splash! Get ready to sweat, socialize, and have a blast with your friends in this unique game that combines the best of traditional sauna culture with modern party fun.

First, step into the steamy sauna and feel the heat and humidity envelop your body.

Once everyone is inside, it's time to start the fun. You can start by whisking each other with broom.

Feeling competitive? You can also fight with other players with sauna equipment. Or you can simply relax and enjoy the company of your friends, chatting, singing, or telling jokes.

Finally, when you've had enough of the sauna, you can cool off in the nearby pool or shower.

Overall, this game is all about having fun, bonding with your friends, and experiencing the unique benefits of sauna culture. So why wait? Download game and get ready to sweat, laugh, and enjoy life to the fullest!

item.title: Shop Legends
item.description:
About This Game

Pick up where your adventures left off and embark on a journey of legends...

Upon your graduation from the most prestigious shopkeeping academy, you received an invitation from your uncle’s best friend, Jacque. Your uncle has mysteriously vanished, leaving the once most renowned shop unattended. Now, it’s time for you to step up and inherit this shop by applying your business acumen to reclaim the shops' status as the most preeminent across the lands. Do you have what it takes to go from zero to hero?

Immerse yourself in an Idle Simulation Tycoon RPG like no other, where you are tasked with simultaneously expanding a profitable item shop, crafting legendary equipment to gear up visiting customers as well as commanding mighty heroes you've recruited to loot rare artifacts & blueprints to challenge the top ranked shopkeepers!

~~~~~~~~~
BECOME A MASTER SHOPKEEPER
~~~~~~~~~
◆ CREATE and DESIGN your fantasy item shop with endless possibilities
◆ CRAFT and FUSE powerful items to sell to visiting adventurers
◆ TRADE with other shopkeepers to build your fame and wealth
◆ CUSTOMIZE your shopkeeper avatar to express your own style

~~~~~~~~~
EXPERIENCE AN EXCITING ADVENTURE
~~~~~~~~~
◆ RECRUIT and equip mighty heroes, each with their own unique abilities
◆ COLLECT epic loot across time limited dungeons and themed events
◆ TEAM UP with your friends or make new ones to build a prosperous city
◆ BATTLE bosses and slay titans together to amass fame and fortune

What are you waiting for? All of these adventures and more awaits you–join the millions of players that have already made Shop Legends their home. Prepare yourself for endless adventure as Aragonia anticipates your awakening!

item.title: my eyes deceive
item.description:
About This Game

Set over the course of roughly a week, you play as a young girl who has been living in a shelter all her life. The outside world is infected with a deadly disease. Society is in chaos. Fortunately, your papa is protecting you.

my eyes deceive is a first-person psychological horror experience that makes players question their perception and consider whether they can blame themselves in retrospect.

FEATURING

  • A twisted, dark, and engaging narrative that gradually unravels itself over the course of the experience.
  • An experience where you uncover and interpret the story as you play.
  • The power of deciding the child's fate. (multiple endings)

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

  • Average playtime: 45 minutes (longer if both endings are desired)
  • It is recommended to carefully pay attention to your surroundings and every word spoken.

DISCLAIMER:

Includes sensitive and distressing subject matter, including highly triggering elements such as suggested sexual abuse. It may be deeply unsettling to some players. Individuals who find disturbing content distressing or have experienced trauma related to these triggers are advised to refrain from playing.

item.title: Princess Polly
item.description:
About This Game

Ahoy, ye daring buccaneers and landlubbers alike! Ready yer sea legs for the legendary saga of "Princess Polly," a thrilling escapade bound to shiver yer timbers! Ye'll join the ranks of a breakdancing ninja, skulking through the shadows of a haunted pirate ship to reclaim the esteemed Princess Polly and her royal kin from the clutches of Captain Pegleg and his peculiar crew—part undead, part lively dancing pirates.

But beware, me hearties! Venture forth into this eerie vessel teeming with chattering parrots, a fearsome Panther, and Pegleg's menagerie of peculiar creatures:

Deck 1: Cargo Holds: Shadowy recesses hiding secrets of yore and mysteries unknown.
Deck 2: Bunkhouse: Revelry reigns in the quarters where pirates revel and plot.
Deck 3: Artillery: Beware the newfangled laser security system guarding treasures untold.
Deck 4: Ballistics: A majestic battle awaits with a mighty Panther and sights of creatures rare.
Deck 5: Main Deck: Princess Polly awaits in her cage amidst the heart of the ship's turmoil.
Deck 6: Captain's Quarters: The lair of Pegleg, harboring danger at every turn.
Deck 7: Pegleg's Perch: Prepare for the ultimate duel with Pegleg himself, a fight to the death!

But 'tis more than a mere rescue! High-maintenance Princess Polly seeks chests brimming with gold to capture her heart. Plunder the treasure, duel with pirates, and ascend the gold leaderboard to claim victory!

Pirate Pegleg, with a taunt upon his lips, challenges ye to try and wrest Princess Polly from his clutches! Can ye navigate the haunted decks, showcase breakdancing ninja prowess, and win Polly's heart? Face peril and outsmart danger in this riveting adventure or find yerself at the mercy of the briny deep! Haha!

Controls:
Move: A, W, S, D or Arrow Keys
Sprint: Shift
Combat: Left/Right Mouse Clicks for sword combos
Roll: Q
Interact: E (with chests and doors)
Walk/Run: 1/2
Pause: P
Mute Audio: M
Quit: Escape key

Remember, should ye lose Stealth, stand motionless for 3 heartbeats to melt back into the shadows. But beware the undead, parrots, and the Panther—eyes sharper than a cutlass! Embark on this perilous voyage, defy Pegleg, and seize victory in the race for Princess Polly's heart! Haha! And don't forget, ye've got nine lives and health packs stashed about each deck to aid yer perilous journey. Aye, onwards, brave souls, for adventure awaits!

item.title: Simple Stock Trading Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to the world of high-stakes finance with our brand-new game, 'Simple Stock Trading Simulator.' Dive into the exciting realm of stock trading, where strategic decision-making is the key to reaching challenging goals and experiencing the thrill of the market.

In this immersive game, we've designed an experience that's not only thrilling but also incredibly accessible. Whether you're a seasoned trader or new to the world of stocks, our gameplay is simple, easy to learn, and straightforward, making it perfect for all skill levels.

Harness your inner financial genius as you embark on a journey to test your trading skills. Every move you make matters, and each decision could be the turning point in your pursuit of success. Will you buy low and sell high? The fate of your virtual fortune is in your hands.

But beware, the stock market is a challenging arena, and it won't always play by your rules. You'll need to adapt, learn from your mistakes, and refine your strategy as you progress. The thrill of the market is in its unpredictability, and that's what makes our 'Simple Stock Trading Simulator' an exhilarating adventure.

So, are you up for the challenge? How long will it take for you to reach your financial goals and become a trading master? Only time will tell in this exciting yet straightforward simulation that offers a taste of the real stock market without the risks.

Experience the rush of trading, make wise decisions, and navigate the volatile world of stocks in 'Simple Stock Trading Simulator.' Get ready to embark on an engaging journey that will put your trading skills to the test, all while having a blast in the process. Dive in now and discover the captivating world of stock trading like never before!

Developers Message:
This is my official first game that I've made. While this is very simplistic, this game did take me awhile to make by myself as an Indie Dev. I hope you enjoy my game and good luck trading.

item.title: Neocon Tower Defence 3
item.description:
About This Game

Neocon Tower Defense 3 is a finger-blisteringly action-packed, fast-paced tower defense game that progressively intensifies with each level.

While the initial stages serve as a gentle introduction to the game mechanics, later levels become increasingly challenging, inundating you with enemy forces from all directions. You'll need split-second decisions to figure out how to counter the relentless and nameless enemy hordes.

With a selection of 20 towers and 10 add-ons and 24 perks to choose from, there's always a new strategy to try out against the escalating threat.

item.title: School Owner
item.description:
About This Game



School Owner is a construction and management simulation game where you manage an entire school, from pre-school to college. It is your job as the owner of the school to build it from the ground up and make sure that the students, employees, parents and even the government are satisfied with your work.

BUILD


You will start with a flat land and random trees that you can chop. From there, you can start designing and developing your school the way you like it.

EXPAND


Expand your lot and have the largest school!

Other Key features:

  • Hire employees that will build, research, assist, teach, cook, clean, and guard your school.
  • Complete control over the schedules of the staffs and students.
  • Buy TV advertising, set up a school website, and do other marketing stunts that will help make your school popular.
  • Day and Night, Season, and Weather system are integrated into the game.
  • If needed, you can take out loans from the bank.
  • Keep your students happy and satisfied by tending to their needs.
  • Do your "to-do" list and get rewarded.
  • Campaign and Sandbox mode

item.title: Egg
item.description:
About This Game

About this game!



> Egg is an interactive clicker game where you need to click egg to earn more eggs.


Features!



> This game supports mouse and keyboard.
> This game supports gamepad (use A button on joystick to click).
> This game uses best HD quality textures that is possible to create.
> Runs on every hardware. Even on BESM.
> Supports all screen resolutions.
> Supports Windows 10/9/11 and so on.
> If you don't like the game you can always easily refund it.

item.title: Son Of Killwa
item.description:
About This Game



Embark on an epic journey of bravery and mystery in "Son of Killwa," an enthralling adventure game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative-driven 3D world, where every twist and turn unfolds a thrilling tale of courage and resilience. Take on the role of a determined protagonist, navigating through a stunning third-person perspective, as intense action and mind-bending puzzles await your skillful hands. Prepare for heart-pounding encounters with formidable foes and delve into challenging enigmas that will put your wit to the test. "Son of Killwa" promises an unforgettable quest where your decisions shape the destiny of the journey. Will you rise to the challenges that lie ahead, or will the shadows of doubt hinder your path to glory? Embark on this unforgettable odyssey, where a myriad of surprises awaits, and let your adventure begin!

Riddles


Embark on an enthralling journey of survival, where the power of your mind holds the key to unlocking the secrets of sustenance. “Son of Killwa" beckons you to think smart, think fast, and think sharp, as you decipher spoken riddles to navigate through the treacherous wilderness in search of food and water. The challenges may be daunting, but your intelligence will guide you, providing the crucial edge to overcome obstacles and seize victory. Will you dare to test your limits and conquer the unknown? The adventure awaits, where survival and intelligence unite in an unforgettable quest for triumph.

Stealth


Embrace the shadows and hone your stealth in the ultimate test of survival. In “Son of Killwa" every step you take is shrouded in danger as the battle-hardened enemy lurks nearby, keenly attuned to any sound or movement. Engaging in brute force is a perilous gamble against their deadly close-combat rebels and long-range snipers, leaving only the savvy few to consider the art of calculated attack or strategic retreat. The odds are against you, but with nerves of steel and a mind that weighs every move, the possibility of survival beckons. Will you evade their watchful eyes and escape into the night, or will you seize your moment and rise as the elusive victor in this enthralling game of wits and wiles? The fate of your life rests in your hands.

Fight Rebels


Prepare to dive into an exhilarating world where every choice is a matter of life and death. In “Son of Killwa" we refuse to strip you of your power; wield the enemy's weapons with deadly precision, from snipers that cut through the darkness to swords that clash in close combat. But be warned, the path of confrontation is fraught with danger, and only the skilled will emerge unscathed. Your journey will force you to confront harrowing decisions: to fight and risk it all or to suffer the slow embrace of starvation. Can you navigate this treacherous tightrope of survival, balancing between life and demise? Your fate lies in your hands, and the world awaits your every move with bated breath.

Find Food and Water


In the midst of this gripping tale of survival, you are thrust into a world where every morsel counts. As an ordinary civilian, untrained in the art of hunting and wilderness survival, your lifeline lies in the scarce remnants left behind by the rebels. Tables become your treasure troves, holding the key to sustaining your fragile existence. Yet, the haunting twist of fate in this war-torn realm comes in the form of an IBS stomach condition, a merciless adversary that siphons away your sustenance before it can fortify your body. Time becomes your foe as food slips through your grasp, urging you to embrace resourcefulness and cunning. Every bite is precious, and every decision holds the power to dictate your destiny. Can you muster the strength and intellect to endure this grueling dance with hunger, or will the relentless war within your body overwhelm you? The battle for survival commences, and only the craftiest minds will emerge triumphant in this unforgettable journey of resilience and determination.

Build And Craft


Embark on a thrilling adventure where your past expertise as an engineer becomes your secret weapon for survival. Crafting in " Son of Killwa: The Ingenious Quest" is second nature to you, for your engineering prowess unlocks the secrets of resourceful ingenuity. No axes or pickaxes required, for the treasures you seek lie hidden amidst the rebel-held territories. Sharpen your wits, as your imagination and intelligence guide you to unearth the elusive resources needed to build your way to sustenance. Tables, abandoned structures, and concealed caches hold the keys to your salvation, and with every carefully fashioned creation, you inch closer to defying the odds. Can you engineer your path to survival, turning the remnants of a war-torn world into tools of hope, or will the challenges crush your aspirations? The journey of resilience and invention awaits, where the genius of your mind will carve the path to your very existence.

item.title: Steel Echoes
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on a chilling odyssey in "Steel Echoes," where a quest for aid takes a nightmarish turn. Stranded with no fuel, you stumble upon a contemporary structure, hoping for sanctuary in the dark expanse. However, as the doors creak open, the illusion of normalcy crumbles, exposing a realm haunted by eerie steel beasts that stealthily pursue your every step. Welcome to a descent into terror where the line between safety and horror blurs.

Key Features:

A Desperate Quest for Light: Navigate through the haunted halls of an enigmatic gallery, cloaked in shadows and filled with unsettling whispers. Armed only with a flickering flashlight powered by elusive batteries, uncover the dark secrets that bind you to this malevolent place.

Steel Statues of Dread: Encounter frozen steel statues that come to life when you gaze away from their eyes. Every step forward is a step deeper into the chilling unknown, where survival depends on mastering the art of avoiding the relentless pursuit of these eerie adversaries.

Unravel the Dark History: Piece together the haunting history of the gallery as you traverse rooms adorned with paranormal occurrences. Ghostly apparitions and unexplained phenomena weave a tale of lost souls and unresolved tragedies, intensifying the atmospheric horror that engulfs you.

Multiple Endings: Face the consequences of your choices as "Steel Echoes" offers multiple endings, each with its own brand of horror. Will you escape the clutches of the gallery, or will the nightmarish cycle persist, ensnaring you in its inescapable grasp?

Eerie Atmosphere and Immersive Storytelling: "Steel echoes" weaves a tale of supernatural torment with atmospheric environments, spine-tingling soundscapes, and a narrative that unfolds like a waking nightmare. Every room is a puzzle, and every encounter a test of your courage as you strive to break free from the gallery's relentless grip.

Can You Escape the Unending Night? Challenge yourself to confront the malevolent forces that lurk within the gallery's walls. "Eternal Loop" invites you to experience a harrowing night of horror where your choices shape your destiny. Will you escape the unending night, or will the loop endure for eternity? The answer lies within the darkness – if you dare to seek it.

item.title: Space Strider
item.description:
About This Game

Space Strider is a 2D Sidescroller Shoot 'em up with Roguelite elements, where you beat hordes of enemies and defeat unique bosses. Unlock, upgrade and level up your Spaceships to become the ultimate Space Strider!

Introduction


In an unknown galaxy in the distant future, many hostile creatures and renegade factions have controlled and steadily expanded their sphere of influence over the past few centuries, posing an ever-increasing threat to galactic peace. As the elected Admiral of the Alliance for Galactic Peace (AGP), it is your job to hunt down and defeat these creatures and renegade factions to restore galactic peace.

Face off against the Vultures in Blue Horizon, the Red Rebels in the Red Cluster, and the Crawlers in Viridius.

Unlock powerful upgrades and expand your fleet with unique Spaceships.



Features:

  • Unlock and play with up to 10 different Spaceships with each having their own unique weapons
  • Level up your Spaceship during a run and choose a PowerUp to make it stronger
  • Upgrade your Spaceships with 20 different global Talents
  • Play in three different levels and beat different enemies and unique bosses
  • Increase the challenge with 5 different danger levels

Roadmap:

  • More levels and enemies
  • ???

item.title: I Ask The Cube Where To Go
item.description:
About This Game

(Using translator)
*Photosensitive epilepsy warning: This Game has high brightness or rapidly changing lens effects.

I Ask The Cube Where To Go is a suffer parkour game, you will face brief falls and repetitive, lengthy, bumpy roads.
-When you start the game, you will see a cube, which is very common.
-When you press WASD or rotate the joystick, you can see the cube moving, which is a very common operation.
-The goal of the game is on the mountain in front of it, which is a very common design.
The cube is actually just rotating, using its own edges to pry and move itself.
You can view the cube from a third or first perspective, or any other way you wish, but it's not that important, just like you don't care what the cube will see you as.
This game should not be as difficult or interesting or good as other similar games.


-----------------------------------
Self rating: 8/10

—— Bilibili：危途异客

item.title: Labyrinthian Lockdown
item.description:
About This Game

Lay down your Defences.
Summon the Militia from the other side to assist you.
Collect scrolls from the enemy and turn the tables with the power within them.
Upgrade your Defences both inside the Labyrinth and out.
Further increase your capabilities of your arsenal with the Masteries.

Labyrinthian Lockdown is a Tower Defence based game that revolves around a Labyrinth that suddenly broke through the surface in a village in the Kingdom of Klondor and now dispenses forces from within in an attempt to claim the land around it's entrance. The Labyrinth will change upon each and every delve, never being the same as previous entries.

Dive into the Labyrinth and protect the Kingdom by defending your Mana Crystal as it is what powers your means of defence that being the power of the elements, one means of defence will be your towers, each one capable of manifesting an elemental projectile allowing you to defeat your foes, another one being the ability to summon units from the Militia from the surface that are mainly used to slow down the enemy while the towers handle the damage, lastly the spell scrolls that have a chance to drop from enemies may be a game changer if applied correctly.

item.title: Marmargee Fighter Girl vs. Zombies & Monsters!
item.description:
About This Game

Marmargee Fighter Girl and her best friend Matmateo Fighter Boy are Astral Undine, Masters of the Vortex.
Zombies and monsters have launched a surprise attack from space devastating the blue planet of Taetania, their homeworld!
Luckily Marmargee and Matmateo were able to escape...
Other worlds are now being invaded by these zombies and monsters and are crying out for help! Will Marmargee be able to stop them? Perhaps with the help of Matmateo?

In this simple low-poly runner style game, you can rerun through 10 unique worlds at 3 speed difficulty levels and have fun destroying different types of Monsters and Zombies... Watch out though for obstacles and traps!
Replay to increase your level or overall score!

item.title: Cargo Duty
item.description:
About This Game

'Cargo Duty' is a goofy horror resource management game. Keep an eye on your ship and don't let any creatures in.

Cargo Duty is a multiplayer game up to 6 players. You and your friends go from moon to moon collecting cargo. There are creatures that will try and stop you. Use the countermeasures on the ship to get rid of any unwanted attention.

How long will you survive ?

item.title: Abandoned Village Walking Group
item.description:
About This Game

"There I saw ----
something that shouldn't be there, or I saw what I've always wanted."

Takanori Nagami is a college student who goes to an abandoned village that has recently become the subject of rumors as part of his circle's activities.
He discovers a strange torii gate with his junior student Mine Honnoji.
What appears there is a young girl in a strange atmosphere, dressed in a Chihaya costume.

The two of you are candidates for sacrifice .......

However, he was also a freak who wanted to desecrate the mystery.
The village custom and the mystery of the sacred tree. An arson attack on the village for no particular reason. The day of the festival is approaching. Arson. The battle for the salvation of mankind by the cursed village begins now.

The game is a horror story in the form of a visual novel.
This is a horror adventure game in a visual novel style.
The estimated playing time is about one hours.
The main character can set fire to the village at any time he likes!

item.title: Surveillance Work | 監視業務
item.description:
About This Game

Overview
"Surveillance Work" is a horror spot-the-difference game where you monitor surveillance camera footage
to discover and report anomalies.
There are two things you do:
・Monitor by switching between multiple surveillance cameras installed in the facility.
・Report any anomalies you find.

There are two reporting methods:
'Direct Report', which reports by clicking on an object, and
'Situation Report', which reports the type and location of the anomaly.

Anomalies can range from objects increasing, disappearing, or moving.
Some anomalies may interfere with surveillance systems such as surveillance cameras and reports,
or may attempt to destroy surveillance cameras, so a calm response is required.

There are two conditions for game over:
・Excessive anomalies appear within the facility.
・Even one surveillance camera is destroyed by an anomaly.

Work starts at 0:00 and ends at 6:00 in the morning.
Please carry out the work until the end time.

About Story
You have been appointed as an observer for "Specific Facility Surveillance Work".
Your ability to work as an observer will be assessed through a five-day probation.
After the work is completed, we will pay you according to the number of anomaly reports and false reports.
Please manage your expenses such as housing and food expenses based on your salary.
Your future will be determined by your work ability and other factors.

In Story, you will monitor five facilities in order.
You can continue the story even if the game is over.
You can see the ending after completing probation.
More than 20 different endings are available.
Some endings give you information about the main character, work, and anomalies.

Postscript
・You can select 30 minutes (default) or 15 minutes (half) for the work time.
・There are about 90 anomalies in each facility.
・Once you finish the story, you can select the difficulty level, adjust the frequency of anomalies,
　and retry. You can also play Training mode.

item.title: Subluminal
item.description:
About This Game

Subluminal is a 3D car driving platformer about gaining speed and going fast.

Vehicles have precise maneuverability allowing you to jump in the air and manipulate your orientation to drive on all surfaces.

All vehicles are equipped with a space displacing mechanism known in Subluminal as a space displacing mechanism or SDM to propel the vehicle forward. This not only allows you to gain speed, but provides aerodynamic control and the ability to conquer any imaginable path.

Key Features

  • Free To Play
  • Single Player: Achieve the fastest time possible, in an elaborate course, with elements that allow you to traverse off the conventional path and into the air. As you complete more courses, the difficulty rises; forcing you out of your comfort zone in order to use all your skill to complete these untraditional courses as fast as you can.

item.title: AIvolution
item.description:
About This Game

Your base is attacked by rebel robots. Repel them by building defensive towers and a fortified defensive wall. Be smart and distribute resources between installing protective structures and improving them.

AIvolution is a 3D tower defense game. Show off your real-time strategy and tactics skills in this sci-fi action game. Your task is to survive the attack of hordes of cyborgs until the timer expires.


Game Features:
- Low poly graphics
- Lots of robots
- Real-time strategy and tactics

item.title: Instruction
item.description:
About This Game



Instruction is a story based clicker game where you, an employee of a power plant, are tasked with generating power for your city. The powerplant's built in intelligence mentor program, or I.M.P. for short, will help you generate the necessary amount of voltage to fulfill your quota. I.M.P may have developed a little too much of a personality for the powerplant's liking, but don't worry! It's still more than capable of keeping you on track.

In this game you'll be tasked with using different systems to generate power. Each system works differently and can be upgraded to increase your efficiency. Discover each of the power plant's mechanisms, and uncover the story behind your less than friendly companion.



  • Over 300 unique lines of dialogue
  • 5 different systems to generate power
  • Secrets and hidden interactions



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
